title: Ashley Graham's growing baby bump takes center stage in racy nude selfie posted after fun night out
text:
She spent the night out on the town and by the time she got home, she was feelin' herself.

Ashley Graham posted a nude selfie to her Instagram stories on Saturday night that showcased her growing baby bump alongside her natural stretch marks.

The model, 31, can be seen covering her chest in the selfie while she lays on her bed completely nude, aside from her simple silver necklace.

Transparency: Ashley Graham, 31, posted a nude selfie to her Instagram stories on Saturday night that showcased her growing baby bump alongside her natural stretch marks

Graham's growing baby bump takes center stage in the photo as a tattoo can be seen peeking out from her lower hip while two stretch marks on her stomach shine in the light.

The Sports Illustrated Swimsuit model has been sharing her journey with pregnancy since the beginning.

On Monday, she posted a video in the nude to share her experience as well as practice self love with her ever changing body.

'Getting bigger and bigger and trying to embrace my new body everyday. It's a journey and I'm so thankful to have such a supportive community,' Graham wrote of the video.

LBD: The mom-to-be poses in a skin-tight little black dress with strappy black heels

And while the body positivity advocate is all about loving her natural body, she also loves dressing her body in fashionable clothing.

Graham posted a few shots of herself from Saturday night before she got home and shed her outer layers.

In the series of photos, the mom-to-be poses in a skin-tight little black dress with strappy black heels.

'[T]he invite said “concert chic”, still figuring that one out [sic],' Graham wrote in the caption.

Updo: For the night out, the model wore her hair up in a sleek ponytail with a deep side part, styled by Justine Marjan

Glowing: Her makeup, applied by Ash K Holm, features a brown and gold smokey eye with a rosy cheek and a dewy glow

Bling! Graham accessorizes with a number of earrings including few gold hoops

For the night out, the model wore her hair up in a sleek ponytail with a deep side part, styled by Justine Marjan.

Her makeup, applied by Ash K Holm, features a brown and gold smokey eye with a rosy cheek and a dewy glow.

Graham accessorizes with a number of earrings including few gold hoops.

Opening up: On Monday, she posted a video in the nude to share her experience as well as practice self love with her ever changing body. 'Getting bigger and bigger and trying to embrace my new body everyday. It's a journey and I'm so thankful to have such a supportive community,' Graham wrote of the video

She's about to welcome her first child with her husband of nine years, Justin Ervin.

The happy couple first announced they were expecting in an August Instagram video.

'Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life. It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world! Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY! Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin Life is about to get even better,' Graham wrote.
description: Ashley Graham was feelin' herself after a night out. She posted a nude selfie to her Instagram stories on Saturday night that showcased her growing baby bump alongside her natural stretch marks.
